mapper.select: select sum(mf.balance) as fundsInPlatform, q.funds as fundsOutPlatform, sum(md.amount) as savingInPlatform, q.saving as savingOutPlatform, sum(mi.price) as insuranceInPlatform, q.insurance as insuranceOutPlatform, sum(ms.amount) as stocksInPlatform, q.stocks as stocksOutPlatform, sum(mg.amount) as goldInPlatform, q.gold as goldOutPlatform, sum(mb.amount) as bondInPlatform, q.bond as bondOutPlatform from questionnaire q, my_fund mf, my_depo md, my_ins mi, my_stock ms, my_gold mg, my_bond mb where q.user_id = #{userId} and mf.user_id = #{userId} and md.user_id = #{userId} and mi.user_id = #{userId} and ms.user_id = #{userId} and mg.user_id = #{userId} and mb.user_id = #{userId};
select d.name as name, md.amount as money, d.rate as annualizedRate, md.maturity as expirationDate from my_depo md inner join deposit_product d on md.product_id = d.id
